name: Spring Chicken
description:
Spring is here, and it's time to migrate down from the mountains to the valley (you know, like chickens do). Get to the temperate base of the mountain to win, but be sure not to leave your egg behind! As parent and child, you two have a joined fate.

Spring Chicken was made by me  (Oliver Morrish) in 48 hours as a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. 

CONTROLS

BUTTONACTIONLeft/RightMoveUpJumpZ
Throw/pick up egg
Up+ZThrow egg upwardsDown+ZPlace egg downXReset Level (costs a life!)
